phrs.translation: 梦幻英雄, 无敌战将, 梦境好汉, 称为
得点王, 得分王, 患上点王, 足球

sentences.sentence: His sons, brother and nephews were his armed sidekicks.
sentences.translation: 他的儿子，兄弟和侄子都是他的左膀右臂，他们都配备了武器。

sentences.sentence: Heroes have sidekicks, siblings and sons, all of whom grow up to look a little like each other.
sentences.translation: 英雄们都有自己的伙伴、兄弟姐妹和儿子，他们长大后看起来都有点像对方。

sentences.sentence: Strong rectangular frame fixed by screws, an inset hole every25 cm to fix the slotting auger, guard board, bunches of cables and circuit diagram sidekicks, etc.
sentences.translation: 坚固的用螺丝固定的长方框，每隔25毫米有一个嵌孔，用来固定槽沟、板、缆束及线路图插袋等。
